title: 25 YEARS OF GREATNESS!
itunes:title: 25 YEARS OF GREATNESS!
description: THIS WEEK WE'RE LIVE AT TWO GUYS SMOKE SHOP IN SALEM, NH CELEBRATING THEIR 25TH ANNIVERSARY! MR. JONATHON, RENZO BIN-AGHI, ERNIE COUTERMARSH AND CHUCK MORRISON JOIN DAVE GAROFALO ON TODAY'S SHOW WHERE THEY SMOKE A 35 YEAR OLD PARTAGAS 150, AS WELL AS THE EXCLUSIVE TWO GUYS SMOKE SHOP 25TH ANNIVERSARY CIGAR. WE GET NOSTALGIC TODAY LOOKING BACK AT THIS DATE IN HISTORY, AND GO BACK TO 1962 DISCUSSING THE CUBAN MISSILE CRISIS. THIS IS AN INSTANT CLASSIC YOU DON'T WANT TO MISS!
